required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on May 29, 2018
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Clinical Trial With Combination of Dienogest/Ethytnilestradiol and Drosperidona/Ethyniestradiol

brief_summary.textblock: This trial will study the percentage of women with at least one occurrence of intracyclic bleeding (bleeding and/or spotting) during the cycles 2 and 3 of treatment with test or reference drug.

primary_outcome.measure: Occurrence of intracyclic bleeding and/or spotting during the cycles 2 and 3 of treatment

secondary_outcome.measure: Percentage of women with intracyclic bleeding during treatment cycles 2 to 7

facility.name: Instituto de Saúde e Bem Estar da Mulher
